events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection around 7 PM yesterday.
The claim has been categorized as an Auto Accident case given the description of the vehicle collision and damages.
Agent John Matthews has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim and will be the primary contact from now on.
An acknowledgment email has been sent to the claimant confirming we received the auto accident claim and will process it promptly.
We requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to support the investigation for this claim.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and preliminary repair quotes.
Claim investigation has started focusing on verifying details of the collision and damage assessment from submitted documents.
Investigation concluded confirming fault and verifying the extent of damages to the insured vehicle from the accident.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs validated during the investigation phase.
The claimant expressed dissatisfaction with the proposed settlement amount stating it does not cover all repair expenses.
Due to the customer’s dissatisfaction, the claim was escalated to a senior adjuster for further review.
After reconsideration, the claim has been approved with an increased settlement amount to better cover all damages.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to the claimant’s bank account as per policy terms.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful settlement payment and confirmation from the claimant.
